p.d: The manager of a travelling circus is found dead in a small village. The victim's close circle are all suspects. However, the gendarmes discover a disturbing clue: the family's youngest son was found dead in the same village ten years earlier. Directed by: Emmanuel Rigaut (season 1, France, 2016) Screenplay: Virginie Brami, Jérémie Marcus, Chloé Marçais Cast: Astrid Veillon (Léa Soler), Stéphane Blancafort (Paul Marchal), Piérick Tournier (Erwan), Nelly Lawson (Camille), François Dominique Blin (Franck Marvaud), Sarah-Cheyenne (Alice), Titouan Laporte (Thomas), Renaud Leymans (Éric Vernet) Genre: detective
